text: The Man in the Moon is a 1991 American coming-of-age drama movie It was directed by Robert Mulligan. The movie stars Reese Witherspoon, Tess Harper, Sam Waterston, Emily Warfield, Jason London, Bentley Mitchum. It is Witherspoon's first movie. The movie was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1991 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Mulligan Category:Movies set in the 1950s Category:Movies about families Category:Movies about sisters Category:Movies about puberty Category:Movies composed by James Newton Howard
title: The Man in the Moon
